channel.title: The Terrace @ MCH
channel.description: Last 10 notes on The Terrace @ MCH

item.title: Brasslands
item.description: The Pitch All aboard a wild adventure across the magical Brasslands! Travel the magical network of rails that can take you from the Western Reach all the way to the tip of the Crescent Coast.

item.title: Happily Ever After
item.description: Vacation has become a whole lot more interesting when you find out that the lands in the Theme Park Capital of the world are not just built up stories, but windows into a magical realm

item.title: Hollywood Magic
item.description: The Pitch Journey to a time you’ve never experienced.

item.title: Lux Universalis
item.description: DnD campaign idea where players are part of a school that’s loosely based on Bauhaus. In this case, Design would be replaced with magic(?).

item.title: Mysterious Island of Magic
item.description: The Pitch Boat crashes on a mysterious island. Everyone starts to realize they have magic powers they did not have before.

item.title: Teenage Guardian Powered People
item.description: The Pitch A great evil has escaped and has set up base on the moon.

item.title: The Celestial Sea
item.description: The Pitch It’s Fantasy adventure in the open sea! Go back to a time where the world was still not fully discovered.

item.title: The Kings’ Highway
item.description: The Pitch The banners are called, brooms are readied, and the road is set for the most exciting race of all time! It’s been a score and two more since the first Journey concluded and established peace across the realm.

item.title: The Old Gods and The New
item.description: The Pitch The party never ends when the Pantheon of gods decide to come down to earth to party with the mortals.

item.title: Campaign Ideas
item.description: A rundown of possible themes for a campaign. Details can be changed to fit the group’s appetite.
